name: assetbyid
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool bravenewcoin.
Tool description: Latest and historic cryptocurrency market data
API description: Retrieves the details of an individual asset. Supply the unique identifier (UUID) of the asset.

The full list of all asset details can be obtained from the Asset endpoint.

is_id.description: The unique resource identifier (UUID) of an asset e.g.  BTC = f1ff77b6-3ab4-4719-9ded-2fc7e71cff1f
